deity_markdown: [Alazhra](/Deities.aspx?ID=510), [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=534), [Ceyannan](/Deities.aspx?ID=535), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=446), [Elion](/Deities.aspx?ID=405), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=648), [Marishi](/Deities.aspx?ID=650), [Obari](/Deities.aspx?ID=356), [Reymenda](/Deities.aspx?ID=482), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Teki Stronggut](/Deities.aspx?ID=505), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213), [Tolte Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=415)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 348 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Alazhra](/Deities.aspx?ID=510), [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=534), [Ceyannan](/Deities.aspx?ID=535), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=446), [Elion](/Deities.aspx?ID=405), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=648), [Marishi](/Deities.aspx?ID=650), [Obari](/Deities.aspx?ID=356), [Reymenda](/Deities.aspx?ID=482), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Teki Stronggut](/Deities.aspx?ID=505), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213), [Tolte Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=415)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** The duration increases to 8 hours.
name: Longstrider

summary: Increase your Speed for an hour.
summary_markdown: Increase your Speed for an hour.
text: Longstrider Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 348 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Alazhra, Barzahk, Ceyannan, Dranngvit, Elion, Jaidz, Marishi, Obari, Reymenda, Sovyrian Conclave, Teki Stronggut, The Deliberate Journey, The Path of the Heavens, Tolte Coatl Cast somatic, verbal Duration 1 hour --- You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. --- Heightened (2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours.
